name: Surprise Follow-Through
text: When striking one opponent, you catch its ally off guard.
prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.
benefit: When using Cleave or Great Cleave, the second foe you attack on your turn is denied its Dexterity bonus against you.
staminaText: When you hit a foe that has been denied its Dexterity bonus by this feat, you can spend 2 stamina points to deal an extra 1d6 points of damage. This damage is precision damage and is not multiplied on a critical hit.
text_zh: 当击中一个敌人时，你能抓住其盟友在防守上的空当。
benefit_zh: 当使用“顺势斩”或“大顺势斩”时，你在你的行动轮攻击的第二个敌人失去对你的敏捷加值。
staminaText_zh: 当你命中了一个因为这个专长失去敏捷加值的敌人时，你可以消耗2点耐力来造成额外1d6点伤害。这个伤害是精准伤害并且不能被重击翻倍。
